keyMoments.title: Donquixote Officers Revealed at Tournament
keyMoments.description: Multiple Donquixote Pirates officers (Senor Pink, Dellinger) are shown participating in or overseeing the Corrida Colosseum tournament.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the crew's involvement in the tournament and Doflamingo's control over Dressrosa's major events.

keyMoments.title: Doflamingo's Trap Revealed
keyMoments.description: It becomes clear that the Mera Mera no Mi tournament is orchestrated by the Donquixote Pirates as a trap to lure and capture Luffy.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the strategic planning and manipulation tactics employed by Doflamingo and his crew.

reveals.information: The crew orchestrated the Corrida Colosseum tournament as a trap for Luffy
Officers Senor Pink and Dellinger are participating in or overseeing the tournament

keyMoments.title: Beautiful Pirates Captain Debuts
keyMoments.description: Cavendish, captain of the Beautiful Pirates, makes his debut appearance at the Corrida Colosseum.
keyMoments.significance: Introduces the crew through their charismatic and narcissistic captain.

reveals.information: The Beautiful Pirates exist as a crew led by the narcissistic Cavendish

keyMoments.title: Happo Navy Members Appear
keyMoments.description: Members of the Happo Navy including Sai and Chinjao appear as silhouettes during the tournament announcement.
keyMoments.significance: First appearance of this influential pirate organization from the Kano Country.

reveals.information: The Happo Navy exists as a powerful pirate organization led by the Chinjao Family
Sai is the current 13th leader, succeeding his grandfather Chinjao
